oai_dc:dc.dc:description: !nanni's father wore a back-dress of genet (or sua). He also wore a back-dress of weasel (or muishond, or dda). He wore a front-dress of ||ko. When he goes away he hangs up the back-dress. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-4.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: !nanni's father's dress
